Package ui.input.selection.layout

Class SelectableBorderedSection<T extends SelectableSection>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.layout.BorderSection<T>
        • ui.input.selection.layout.SelectableBorderedSection<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of selectable section to border.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintHandler, Section, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    public class SelectableBorderedSection<T extends SelectableSection>
extends BorderSection<T>
implements SelectableSection
    A bordered selectable section.
    Adds a border around another section.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ui.drawing.layout.BorderSection

      • enabled

        public boolean enabled()
        Whether the section is enabled for selection or not. In this case pass through to underlying section.
        Specified by:
        enabled in interface SelectableSection
        Returns:
        Boolean; true if enabled.

      • setParent

        public void setParent​(SelectionHandler parent)
        Set the parent selection handler (meant to handle selection in a direction this section has no more options). In this case pass through to underlying section.
        Specified by:
        setParent in interface SelectableSection
        Parameters:
        parent - The new parent selection handler.
